Doggit07 and Massive74: As grfam said, this is a completely different product to Ground Enviroment X for U.S, Canada and Europe.
FS global is 3D terrain mesh, basically it adds all the lumps and bumps on the earth so it doesn't look so flat.
Pretty Please: someone who already d/l this torrent upload only the FS GLOBAL 2010 for FSX, for time sake!

There's always confusion on what this program is compared to others.  This program is terrain MESH where Ground Environment is terrain textures.  Mesh is what gives you peaks and valleys and makes mountains look more realistic as far as height and so on.  GE puts the details on those peaks and valleys.  e.g.  houses, roads, and the like.  Textures (GE) over lay mesh (FSG).  They are not alike.  Hope this clears up some confusion!
